title: Italy recognises the crime of femicide | ABC NEWS
description: Italian lawmakers have unanimously backed a bill making femicide — the intentional killing of women or girls — a specific crime punishable by life imprisonment. The government initiative, already approved by the Senate in July, passed with 237 votes in favour and none against. The vote coincided with International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women, a day designated by the UN General Assembly.  Produced by Megan Jacobson for the ABC News Social Media Team. title: Thai government's response to flooding under scrutiny | ABC NEWS
description: Floodwaters are beginning to recede in southern Thailand, after more than 50 people were killed. Thousands are still sheltering in community-led evacuation centres as the Thai government comes under scrutiny for its slow and inadequate response. title: NSW fatal shark attack triggers painful memories for past survivor | ABC NEWS
description: A woman has died, and a man has been seriously injured in a shark attack on New South Wales' Mid North Coast. Local survivor Dave Pearson, who founded Bite Club, says that shark death events can be retraumatising for survivors but emphasises the importance of appreciating every day after survival. title: Crews search floor-to-floor through Hong Kong towers looking for survivors | ABC NEWS
description: More than 250 people remain unaccounted for after a deadly apartment complex fire in Hong Kong.  Family members are desperately searching for relatives, while Hong Kong authorities begin inspecting building sites for similar fire risks that caused the conflagration. title: Warnings over Black Friday sales 'debt spiral' | The Business | ABC NEWS
description: With millions of Australians tipped to spend record amounts this Black Friday, the value of personal credit and charge-card balances accruing interest has hit its highest level since 2021.  Financial counsellors warn promotions and the festive season put social pressure on Australians to spend beyond their means during the sales period. title: National Guard shooting suspect worked with CIA in Afghanistan before moving to US | ABC NEWS
description: National Guard members Sarah Beckstrom, 20, and Andrew Wolfe, 24  remain in a critical condition after a shooting just streets away from the White House. The FBI says it is treating the shooting as a terrorist act as it carries out searches on properties on the United States west coast. Alleged shooter, Rahmanullah Lakanwal, worked with the CIA in Afghanistan prior to moving to the US in 2021. title: What is life like on Australia's Casey Station in Antarctica? | ABC NEWS
description: Every year, hundreds of expeditioners travel to Antarctica to support Australia's research stations and conduct vital scientific research. This year, ABC's Antarctic reporter Jano Gibson and camera operator Owain Stia-James have joined them, travelling to Casey Station with the support of the Australian Antarctic Program. title: Who owns your face and voice? | ABC NEWS
description: Australians who share AI deepfakes created without consent could be sued or fined under a bill being introduced to the Senate by independent David Pocock.   The proposal seeks to add a dedicated complaints framework to the Online Safety Act, granting the eSafety Commissioner powers to demand deepfake removals and issue immediate fines.   By ABC Specialist Reporting Team.   ABC NEWS provides around the clock coverage of news events as they break in Australia and abroad. title: NSW to scrap law recognising heritage value of brumbies in Kosciuszko National Park | ABC NEWS
description: A controversial bill to recognise the heritage value of feral horses in Kosciuszko National Park will be scrapped.  Richard Swain from the Invasive Species Council says brumbies cause widespread damage to the Snowy Mountains wetlands and the national park is fundamentally unsuited to hoofed animals. title: Police officer guilty of dangerous driving causing death of Jai Kalani Wright | ABC NEWS
description: Police officer Benedict Bryant has been found guilty in the death of 16-year-old Jai Kalani Wright, who died in February 2022 during a police pursuit while riding a stolen trail bike in Alexandria. description: Sometimes, it's the small details that matter in an investigation. title: Putin pours cold water on revised peace deal with Ukraine | ABC NEWS
description: Vladimir Putin has made his first public remarks on a proposed peace deal with Ukraine, reiterating that Crimea and the Donbas must be recognised as Russian territory. The Russian president says the territorial claims will be achieved either through a deal or militarily. title: Abandoned newborn baby found outside Canberra fire station | ABC NEWS
description: Police are concerned for the welfare of the mother of a newborn baby boy found outside a fire station in Canberra's south on Thursday morning.   The baby was found outside South Tuggeranong Fire and Rescue Station in Conder just after 7am and has since been taken to Canberra Hospital with no obvious injuries.   The baby is estimated to be less than 24 hours old and police assume the baby was not born in a medical facility.
